scripts.build: cd ../LCV-angular && npm run-script docker && cd ../LCV-events && npm run-script docker && cd ../LCV-ssl-certbot && npm run-script docker && cd ../LCV-users && npm run-script docker
scripts.deploy: docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) && docker pull oursgroumy/lcv-angular && docker pull oursgroumy/users && docker pull oursgroumy/lcv-events && docker pull oursgroumy/lcv-ssl-certbot && docker-compose up
